name: Lobster Newburg
author: PATTY5
summary: Use fresh lobster if available, but 2 (6 ounce) cans of lobster may be used instead.  This recipe is rich and delicious. If you do not like spicy food, use paprika in place of cayenne pepper. Serve hot, over buttered toast slices.
ingredients: ¾ pound cooked lobster meat, broken into chunks
directions: In a small bowl, whisk together egg yolks and heavy cream until well blended
Melt butter in a saucepan over low heat
Stir in the egg yolk mixture and sherry
Cook, stirring constantly until the mixture thickens
Remove from heat, and season with salt, cayenne, and nutmeg
Return pan to low heat, and cook gently until heated through
Serve hot over slices of buttered toast
